name: Dark World Puppetry
text: Target up to 3 cards in any GY(s); banish them, then discard 1 Fiend monster. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your banished Fiend monsters; add it to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Dark World Puppetry" per turn.
